Title: Comrades Mao Zedong, Zhou Enlai, Liu Shaoqi, Zhu De, Deng Xiaoping and Chen Yun together
Designer: Xinhua she (新华社)Du Xiuxian (杜修賢)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: From left to right: Zhu De, Zhou Enlai, Chen Yun, Liu Shaoqi, Mao Zedong, Deng Xiaoping.Original photograph taken by Du Xiuxian at the '7,000 Cadre Big Conference', 1962.
